name: CampingSounds
0:
”Alexa open Camping Sounds”
”Alexa ask Camping Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: camping sounds
des:
Escape into the tranquil embrace of nature with Camping Sounds, your personal gateway to relaxation and mental rejuvenation. Designed to bring the calming essence of the outdoors into your home, this Alexa skill meticulously recreates the soothing ambiance of a campsite at dusk, complete with the harmonious symphony of the wilderness.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Camping Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
